  • Method Details

    • createPhaseInformation

      public static HeatProps.RelayContactInformation createPhaseInformation(ComponentUtil util, int cnt, ComponentUtil.PreferredRelay first, ComponentUtil.PreferredRelay... preferredRelays)
      Utility method to create a HeatProps.RelayContactInformation.
      Parameters:
      util - the ComponentUtil
      cnt - the number of relays
      first - the first ComponentUtil.PreferredRelay
      preferredRelays - the other PreferredRelays
      Returns:
      the created HeatProps.RelayContactInformation
      See Also:
      • HeatProps.RelayContactInformationProvider

    • relayContactDef

      public static <P extends Type.Parameter.BundleProvider & HeatProps.RelayContactInformationProvider> AppDef<OpenemsApp,Nameable,P> relayContactDef(int contactPosition, Nameable... allContacts)
      Creates a AppDef for selecting a relay contact. Sets the default value from the HeatProps.RelayContactInformation and also disables options which are already used by other components.
      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of the parameter
      Parameters:
      contactPosition - the number of the contacts to select e. g. a HeatPump app needs 2 relay contacts to be configured pass 1 for the first and 2 for the second one.
      allContacts - the other names of contacts
      Returns:
      the AppDef

    • phaseGroup

      @SafeVarargs public static <APP extends OpenemsApp, PROP extends Nameable & Type<PROP, APP, P>, P extends Type.Parameter.BundleProvider> AppDef<APP,PROP,P> phaseGroup(PROP... phaseDefs)
      Creates a AppDef for a group of picking contacts from relays. Used to not pick contacts twice.
      Type Parameters:
      APP - the type of the app
      PROP - the type of the property
      P - the type of parameter
      Parameters:
      phaseDefs - the AppDefs of the relay contacts
      Returns:
      the AppDef
